message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. I think this is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $15000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to lower the price to $11500. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you. What do you think?
